definition: Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: The resources of the Han nationality origin is the base of the tour for root_seeking.
sentences.chinese: 汉姓发源地资源是近年来开展寻根游的主要依据。

sentences.english: The places of the surnames of the surnames of the Han nationality origin have distinct regional character.
sentences.chinese: 汉姓及其发源地的分布有明显的地域性。

definition: to bestow a surname (of emperor conferring favor on ethnic group)
